summary:
This mod edits all of Whiterun world. by adding more clutter (barrels chests containers shrines ect)
Quite allot of new trees and plants as well.
descriptionHtml:
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/54663/?]Adorning Whiterun v2 out Now![/url]

Like this page for latest updates on whats happening: https://www.facebook.com/pages/Jiubiizeekks-Skyrim-mods/146300595538178

[size=13][b]Description/what this is about[/b][/size]
Well this is a mod that changes Whiterun's exterior cells and interior cells, making Whiterun more immersive by adding plants-trees-flowers-crates-containers plus lots lots more clutter and this is just outside (completed by the way, unless people can identify something more to add).
At the moment most of the interiors have some sort of edit that adds something. EXCLUDING BREEZEHOME, BECAUSE MANY PEOPLE HAVE MODS THAT ALREADY EDIT THIS.


[size=13][b]Added NPC's?[/b][/size]
Well yes i have added loads of new Npc's that roam within and around Whiterun's walls.
In total there is four new merchants that work, one is hidden.
Skadi was ment to be a merchant but because WhiterunWorld is bugged it will not allow another merchant to sell items so for now Lets say he works for the drunken huntsman.
One guard will now be in the bannered mare full time, doesn't matter weather your stormcloaks or imperials the guard will be either faction.
plus lots more Npc's

[size=13][b] Incompatibilities![/b][/size]
THIS IS INCOMPATIBLE WITH ANY MOD THAT EDITS ANY AREA INSIDE WHITERUN CITY BE IT INTERIOR OR EXTERIOR. ALSO INCOMPATIBLE WITH ANYTHING EDITING JUST OUTSIDE WHITERUN'S GATE.
If your using RLO or any other lighting mod (except COT) load it after this mod.

[size=13][b]Other General Notes[/b][/size]
Thing's have been changed since pictures were done, just for lag issues.
With all these item's in most areas i get around 27fps (and i have a bad computer)

Dragon Stretch:
Food onto tables. added lots more genral clutter and thing's for npc's to do.
farengar now has a better study with more scrolls and book cases. ect.

Belethor's general goods:
Moved that annoying table that caused hired thugs to come and try kill you) added more clutter. added room bounds to it isnt as laggy.

Bannered mare:
Allot more clutter made some huge changed to where furniture sits and added more things for npc's to interact with.

The drunken Huntsman:
More clutter. and lauder's bed.

Warmaiden's:
Mannequins have been added and a coupple of armor pieces.

Jorvaskr:
New table cooking pot and lots of new clutter.

Whiterun Priory:
this is where the Guards wife's live (this building is next to the front gate of whiterun)

No more lonely cow. i have added some farm animals inside the city like another cow and a few chickens, also there is two rabbits.
outside the city i have added some animals to the Stables, included is two more horses, a couple of goats, a dog and a chicken.

generally just lots more clutter to well every where. check out the images.

MY OTHER MOD
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/27510/]Nine Bards Of Skyrim[/url]
MY OTHER MOD
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/30137/]Ji's Npc Immersion[/url]
My other mod
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/33008]viking longhouse - Loftstrom[/url]

Facebook Page:
[url=http://www.facebook.com/pages/Jiubiizeekks-Skyrim-mods/146300595538178]JiubiIzeekk's skyrim mods[/url]
author: Jiubiizeekk

files.name: Adorning Whiterun V1
files.changelogHtml:
Initial release.
added more npc's to whiterun.
New building's: Whiterun priory, and 3 new houses.
New merchants

files.name: V1 1 attemped at fixing the arcadia couldren
files.fileName: V1 1 attemped at fixing the arcadia couldren -35077-V1-1.rar
files.changelogHtml:
Attempted to fix Arcadia's cauldron. diddnt work.
changed a few things. (scraped as this version is stuffed check V1.2)

files.name: V1 2 Fixed everything
files.changelogHtml:
i have fixed and changed Arcadia's cauldron.
added more clutter to places (interiors)
added 2 more NPC's A Greymane clan friend and a Battleborn clanfriend.
Files aren't packed in .bsa this time no all faceGen should work.

files.name: V1 3 General Clutter added
files.changelogHtml:
Most of the interiors have had chests and other general clutter added. i think Whiterun is a place for thieves now.
Changed some Npc's packages.

files.name: V1 4
files.changelogHtml:
Replaced wilbur's house door's they should now appear.
added two new npc's (Greymane and battleborn clan friends)
furthermore edited npc's packages

files.name: Version 5
files.changelogHtml:
Two New scripts Attached to two Books. One enables More items in whiterun (only for people with High end Pc's) And Then by default The performance version is enabled.
These two books can be found On a table outside of the 'Bannered mare'.

Other changes:
I Have made a new deck area Outside the Bannered mare with some new texture sets.
Added a tower that overlooks the Whiterun market.
Removed pointless Walkways on top of the gate'wall near the market.
Enable/disable scripts as explained above.
some more clutter.
Fixed some things.
Changed some navmesh.
Added a New Npc, you'll see him around.
Moved Skadi Fletcher's Worktable/stall, it is now Near hemskeir's house.
Changed some Textures on The two Ysgramor statues. Don't worry they don't replace the vanilla ones.
Added a plaque under the Ysgramor statue near the Graveyard.
The Banners on the canape heading into dragon stretch will change when the stormclaoks take over.
The Fisherman will now take his car outside the wall's a coupple days a week to go fishing.

Plus Lots More
